text: @piersmorgan @RishiSunak I like the guy, but he’s had it pretty easy in comparison to others in his role as #RobinHood throughout the #coronavirus #pandemic He hasn’t been empathetic to all, some people have been left out and his lack of action in these areas will not be forgotten!
